venue.address_1: 40 Village Street, Boston / 1730 Cambridge Street, Cambridge
venue.name: Northeastern University - West Village F Building / Harvard University - David Rockefeller Center for Latin American Studies

item.description:
The Boston Latino International Film Festival is taking place Thursday, Oct 25 through Sunday, Oct 28!  Please check out www.bliff.org for detailed information about film screenings, programs, and summaries of films.

The whole festival is run by volunteers and we need your help!  We need volunteers to help with movie projectionists, info table, box office, tickets, greeting, set-up, etc... The festival is going to be running the same time at two locations:

Northeastern University / John O’Bryant African-American Institute
40 Leon Street, Boston, MA 02115


AND


Harvard University / David Rockefeller Center for Latin American Studies

1730 Cambridge Street, Cambridge, MA 02138

 

If you are interested in volunteering, please put the location of preference in your comment.  Show up at either location and try to find me [at Northeastern] or Erin [at Harvard].  Remember, all volunteers receive a 4-day movie pass for free!  And, it's fun to mingle with other Latino movie lovers!

 

Thanks and looking forward to seeing you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: Contact me for information on how to volunteer.

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: VOLUNTEER for the Boston Latino International Film Festival!!
